plot outline: When Malavika (Nandana) is stood up on the day of her wedding, her photographer friend, Joji becomes the good Samaritan lending her a helping hand to get through such a difficult time. What follows is a series of unfortunate coincidences that lead to comical fiascos of an epic proportion. Watch the full movie, Snehithan, only on Eros Now.
title: Snehithan
plot: Malavika waits for her lover, Anand, to register their marriage at the registrar office. However, he fails to turn up while her friend, Joji, accompanies her.

When Malavika (Nandana) is stood up on the day of her wedding, her photographer friend, Joji becomes the good Samaritan lending her a helping hand to get through such a difficult time. What follows is a series of unfortunate coincidences that lead to comical fiascos of an epic proportion. Watch the full movie, _Snehithan_ (qv), only on Eros Now.
